trans-unit.source: An inline-level flow content element intended to contain a run of formatted or unformatted text.

Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run.Text%2A> property of the Run object is a dependency property, which means that you can bind the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run.Text%2A> property to a data source.
The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run.Text%2A> property fully supports one-way binding in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> and other controls that display read-only text.
For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Binding text to a Run object contained within <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> is not supported.
Editing operations within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> may cause the binding to be cleared.
Initializes a new, default instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref> class, taking a specified string as the initial contents of the text run.
A string specifying the initial contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref> object.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref> class, taking a specified string as the initial contents of the text run, and a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position for the text run.
A string specifying the initial contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref> object.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer"></xref> specifying an insertion position at which to insert the text run after it is created, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for no automatic insertion.

Returns a value that indicates whether or not the effective value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run.Text*> property should be serialized during serialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref> object.
A serialization service manager object for this object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run.Text*> property should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
manager is .
Gets or sets the unformatted text contents of this text <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref>.

Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the Text property of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run> object is a dependency property, which means that you can bind the Text property to a data source.
The Text property fully supports one-way binding in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> and other controls that display read-only text.
For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Binding text to a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run> object contained within <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> is not supported.
Editing operations within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> may cause the binding to be cleared.
A string that specifies the unformatted text contents of this text <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Run"></xref>.
The default is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run.Text*> dependency property.
To be added.
